pages.text: The $(mob)Anubis$() is a humanoid monster that spawns in deserts on the surface in the $(thing)Overworld$(). It is resistant to Fire. The $(mob)Anubis$() will attack players on sight with a mix of melee and ranged attacks, and can apply a $(thing)Slowness$() or $(thing)Blindness$() effect to its target. In combat, it can spawn up to 2 $(mob)Skeletons$() with headgear, also granting summoned $(mob)Skeletons$() a $(thing)Resistance$() effect.
$(mob)Anubi$() drop $(item)Book Bag$() on death. Right-click to open the bag and receive a random enchantment book.

$(mob)Anubis() drop $(item)Gold Box$() on death, which can be right-clicked while held to open and receive a random tool, weapon, or armor piece made of gold. Alternatively, it can be smelted in a furnace to create $(item)Crystalized Experience (Medium)$().
